data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Chechnya, Russia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chechnya, Russia

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Chechnya, Russia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 98 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Chechnya, Russia.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Chechnya, Russia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Chechnya
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tindin people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chechnya, Russia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Chechnya with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chechnya, Russia has a population of 1,210,000.

We estimate Chechnya has 17,708 people who might know Jesus, 679,151 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 513,141 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Chechnya to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
